trans-unit.source: Connect to Operational Insights from System Center Operations Manager
trans-unit.target: Connect to Operational Insights from System Center Operations Manager

trans-unit.source: Learn about how to connect to Operational Insights through Operations Manager.
trans-unit.target: Learn about how to connect to Operational Insights through Operations Manager.

trans-unit.source: Connect to Operational Insights from System Center Operations Manager
trans-unit.target: Connect to Operational Insights from System Center Operations Manager

trans-unit.source: You can connect Operational Insights to an existing System Center Operations Manager environment.
trans-unit.target: You can connect Operational Insights to an existing System Center Operations Manager environment.

trans-unit.source: This will allow you to use existing Operations Manager agents for data collection.
trans-unit.target: This will allow you to use existing Operations Manager agents for data collection.

trans-unit.source: For additional information about using Operations Manager with Operational Insights, see <link><linkText>Operations Manager considerations with Operational Insights</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional information about using Operations Manager with Operational Insights, see <link><linkText>Operations Manager considerations with Operational Insights</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: If you use Operations Manager to monitor any of the following workloads, then you'll need to set Operations Manager run-as accounts for them.
trans-unit.target: If you use Operations Manager to monitor any of the following workloads, then you'll need to set Operations Manager run-as accounts for them.

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>Operations Manager considerations with Operational Insights</linkText><title></title></link> for more information about setting the accounts.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>Operations Manager considerations with Operational Insights</linkText><title></title></link> for more information about setting the accounts.

trans-unit.source: SQL Assessment
trans-unit.target: SQL Assessment

trans-unit.source: Virtual Machine Manager
trans-unit.target: Virtual Machine Manager

trans-unit.source: Lync Server
trans-unit.target: Lync Server

trans-unit.source: SharePoint
trans-unit.target: SharePoint

trans-unit.source: Support for Operational Insights is available as of Operations Manager 2012 SP1 UR6 and Operations Manager 2012 R2 UR2.
trans-unit.target: Support for Operational Insights is available as of Operations Manager 2012 SP1 UR6 and Operations Manager 2012 R2 UR2.

trans-unit.source: Proxy support was added in System Center Operations Manager 2012 SP1 UR7 and System Center Operations Manager 2012 R2 UR3.
trans-unit.target: Proxy support was added in System Center Operations Manager 2012 SP1 UR7 and System Center Operations Manager 2012 R2 UR3.

trans-unit.source: To connect Operations Manager to Operational Insights and add agents
trans-unit.target: To connect Operations Manager to Operational Insights and add agents

trans-unit.source: In the Operations Manager console, click Administration.
trans-unit.target: In the Operations Manager console, click Administration.

trans-unit.source: Expand the Operational Insights node and click Operational Insights Connection.
trans-unit.target: Expand the Operational Insights node and click Operational Insights Connection.

trans-unit.source: Click the Register to Operational Insights link and follow the onscreen instructions.
trans-unit.target: Click the Register to Operational Insights link and follow the onscreen instructions.

trans-unit.source: After completing the registration wizard, click Add a Computer/Group.
trans-unit.target: After completing the registration wizard, click Add a Computer/Group.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Operations Manager add a computer/group</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Operations Manager add a computer/group</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Computer Search dialog box you can search for computers or groups monitored by Operations Manager.
trans-unit.target: In the Computer Search dialog box you can search for computers or groups monitored by Operations Manager.

trans-unit.source: Select computers or groups to onboard to Operational Insights, click Add, and then click OK.
trans-unit.target: Select computers or groups to onboard to Operational Insights, click Add, and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Operations Manager add computers</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Operations Manager add computers</linkText>
